articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Secondary School in Rakwon County
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Secondary School in Rakwon County
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to Honored Red Flag Sojung Secondary School newly built in Rakwon County.
					 This school was constructed by solider-builders dispatched by leader Kim Jong Il as a benevolent present to the children in a seaside village. He also sent many educational equipment and materials, including computers, to the school.
					
					 After being briefed on the history of the school, he acquainted himself in detail with the conditions of computer education, going round a room for computer education, guided by the principal of the school.
					
					 Saying that in order to help everyone acquire high computing technique it is urgent to fix the computer education as a major basic subject at the stage of elementary and secondary education and concentrate efforts on it, he underscored the need to work out the teaching schedule well in conformity with the characters of schoolers and raise the qualifications of teachers in this field.
					
					 Noting that all students of the school should study hard to properly use computers in their school days, he showed great loving care again by solving problems arising in this.
					
					 Then he went round a classroom, a tractor training room, a room of stuffed specimens, a gymnasium and other places of the school to learn in detail about how the education is conducted.
					
					 It is very good that the schoolers are conducting brisk diverse production practices and after-school sports activities including swimming, he said, adding that when they cultivate their physical strength and learn how to drive tractors and trucks during their secondary school days, they will be able to do military service well and have their share in socialist construction.
					
					 He expressed satisfaction over the fact that the teachers of the school have achieved many successes in the education of the rising generations by devotedly working to carry through the party policy of preparing students to be reliable pillars of the country with ample knowledge, high morality and strong body, and highly appreciated their devoted services others do not know.
					
					 Stating that education of rising generations is vital for the destiny of a country and an important requirement for successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, he advanced highly important tasks to be carried out in secondary school education.
					
					 The rosy future of Korea is firmly guaranteed as we have the scientific and revolutionary ideas and theories on education and advantageous educational system, he said.
					
					 Studying is the first and foremost task for schoolers, he said, urging the schools to give priority to the work for carrying through the study-first policy of the party and train the new generations to be talents capable of contributing to building a thriving nation with their high caliber.
					
					 What is of particular importance in developing education is to improve the quality of secondary school education, he stressed.
					
					 Saying that successful education and quality of the generations to come, the future of the country, depend on how teachers work, he stressed the need for all the teachers to devote all their wisdom and energies to the education of the rising generations, cherishing the high sense of responsibility and pride of being career revolutionaries.

articles.title: UNSC Urged to Retract Anti-DPRK Steps
articles.content:
UNSC Urged to Retract Anti-DPRK Steps
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued a statement today as regards the fact that the hostile forces' vicious moves against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes have reached the extremely dangerous phase.
					 In accordance with its "presidential statement" which has no binding force, on April 24 the UNSC officially designated three companies of the DPRK as targets of sanctions and many kinds of military supplies and materials as embargo items over the DPRK's peaceful satellite launch, a DPRK's exercise of sovereignty, and thus committed such illegal provocations as setting in motion its sanctions on the DPRK, the statement notes, and says:
					
					 Such sanctions can never work on the DPRK which has been subject to all sorts of sanctions and blockade by the hostile forces for the past scores of years.
					
					 What is serious is the fact that the UNSC has set out in directly jeopardizing the security of the country and the nation, the supreme interests of the DPRK, though it had already wantonly infringed the sovereignty of a sovereign state, pursuant to the U.S. moves.
					
					 The hostile forces are foolishly scheming to suffocate the DPRK's defence industry by physical methods as they failed to attain their aims for disarming the DPRK through the six-way talks.
					
					 In the 1990s the DPRK already declared that any anti-DPRK sanctions to be put by the United Nations, a legal party to the Korean Armistice Agreement, would be regarded as a termination of the agreement, that is, a declaration of war.
					
					 The desire for denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula has gone forever with the six-way talks and the situation is inching to the brink of war by the hostile forces. The DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs solemnly gives the following warnings to cope with such grave situation:
					
					 The UNSC should promptly make an apology for having infringed the sovereignty of the DPRK and withdraw all its unreasonable and discriminative "resolutions" and decisions adopted against the DPRK.
					
					 This is the only way for it to regain confidence of the UN member nations and fulfill its responsibility for maintaining international peace and security, not serving as a tool for the U.S. highhanded and arbitrary practices any longer.
					
					 In case the UNSC does not make an immediate apology, such actions will be taken as:
					
					 Firstly, the DPRK will be compelled to take additional self-defensive measures in order to defend its supreme interests.
					
					 The measures will include nuclear tests and test-firings of intercontinental ballistic missiles.
					
					 Secondly, the DPRK will make a decision to build a light water reactor power plant and start the technological development for ensuring self-production of nuclear fuel as its first process without delay.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A friendly delegation of the Vietnam Union of Friendship Organizations led by General Secretary Dao Duy Tien arrived here by air on Wednesday.

articles.title: High-yielding Saplings Produced
articles.content:
High-yielding Saplings Produced
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Lots of saplings of good species are being produced by the Aeguk Tree Explantation Institute of the Branch Academy of Forestry under the DPRK State Academy of Sciences.
					 The saplings nursed by it grow fast while preserving their hereditary characteristics as they are produced by means of explantation and cuttage.
					
					 Explantation is of great economic value as it makes it possible to produce tens of thousands of saplings with a tree. And the saplings are high in the rate of rooting because they are nursed in greenhouses and then outdoors. 
					
					 Those saplings grow fast and move up the fruit bearing time.
					
					 The saplings of good species include those of large chestnut, aronia melanocarpa, new species of paulownia, euonymus japonica and hinoki.
					
					 Large chestnut is usually two to three meters high and big chestnut-burs can be picked in the third year after planting. 
					
					 Aronia melanocarpa begins to bear fruit in two or three years. Its vitamin P content being ten times the fruit of hawthorn, it is an effective remedy for such diseases as arteriosclerosis and hypertension.
					
					 New species of paulownia grows three or four meters annually and reaches the height of about twenty meters in five years.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Political Decision Not to Participate in Six-party Talks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Political Decision Not to Participate in Six-party Talks
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- It was an entirely just exercise of the sovereignty that the DPRK made a crucial political decision that it would not participate in the six-party talks under any circumstances but bolster its self-defensive nuclear deterrent in every way, bitterly condemning the brigandish "presidential statement" of the UNSC.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday declares this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The decision fully reflected the revolutionary will and principle of the DPRK to protect its dignity and interests, independence and justice.
					
					 Forces hostile to the DPRK such as the U.S. and Japan are letting loose a spate of remarks critical of the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes. This goes to prove that everything is going well in the DPRK and its satellite launch is of weighty significance. It also indicates that the forces are greatly taken aback by the national power of the DPRK.
					
					 It is a very narrow-minded view to misrepresent the crucial measure taken by the DPRK as brinkmanship and an action to pressurize someone.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers should be held entirely responsible for having left indelible disgrace and stain again on the history of the UN by violating the principle of respect for the sovereignty and the impartiality, the life and soul of the UNSC and a fundamental cornerstone of its activities. 
					
					 The U.S. and other forces hostile to the DPRK are busing themselves with the activities to bring the six-party talks back on track, regarding it as an urgent job. But it is no use crying over spilt milk. The DPRK does not feel any need to have anymore the six-party talks bereft of the spirit of respect for sovereignty and equal sovereignty enshrined in the September 19 joint statement for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, talks aimed to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and disarm it.
					
					 As proven by the recent situation, the escalating smear campaign of the hostile forces against the DPRK and their moves to lay an international siege to it will never help settle issues but only make the situation more complicated.
					
					 The above-said forces are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can bring the DPRK to its knees and exact any concession through their escalating pressure and sanctions against it.
					
					 The DPRK declares once again that it will never participate in the six-party talks but bolster its nuclear deterrent in everyway in order to defend the security of the country and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Unreasonable Suppression of S. Korean Singer Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Unreasonable Suppression of S. Korean Singer Assailed
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A singer of south Korea posted an article hailing the DPRK's satellite launch on his internet homepage. Wicked conservatives including the "Grand National Party" are now persecuting and suppressing him by letting loose a whole string of malignant vituperations and accusations, describing his article as something very serious. This is nothing but a disgusting behavior of those hell-bent on the confrontation with the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The above-said singer wrote what he should say as a member of the nation. It is hard to understand what made these conservatives so displeased and angry that they made such fuss, letting loose unspeakable accusations against him. 
					
					 They should have rejoiced over what fellow countrymen did anything good. But they took issue with his patriotic behavior praising it. What the conservatives are doing cannot be interpreted otherwise than jealousy of the mean and ill-natured guys because they are confrontation-minded maniacs keen to bar fellow countrymen from making any success and progress at any cost, extremely displeased with them, and realize their wild ambition. 
					
					 The Lee group is, however, miscalculating. With no desperate effort can the group hold in check the just advance of the people from all walks of life in south Korea to achieve independent reunification, the reunification through alliance with the north, their hearts burning with desire for reunification, their mind-set running towards it. 
					
					 The acts of treachery and fascist actions intensified by the Lee group quite contrary to the trend of the times would only precipitate its thorough isolation and political doom.

articles.title: Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Forces Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Forces Slammed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils made public a statement on April 24 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its anti-reunification action.
					 The statement accused the judicial authorities of sentencing leading members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration to prison terms on April 21 after labeling the solidarity as an "enemy-benefiting organization." It termed the unreasonable sentence a total negation and challenge to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The solidarity has taken the lead in the struggle for independence, democracy and reunification since its formation, the statement said, asserting all the facts clearly prove that nothing can be expected from the Lee "government" as it is keen on confrontation with the DPRK and fascist dictatorship.
					
					 The Lee "government" is, indeed, a group of sycophants and traitors standing in the way of democratization of the south Korean society and national reunification while escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula, it declared.
					
					 It demanded that the authorities immediately lift the above-said label attached to the solidarity and release the detainees.

articles.title: Actions to Force Japan to Settle Its Past Crimes Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions to Force Japan to Settle Its Past Crimes Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Representatives of more than 50 civic and social organizations in south Korea including the All-People Committee for Proper Settlement of Past and the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps held a meeting in Seoul on April 25 at which they called on the people from all walks of life to turn out in the struggle to force Japan to settle the past crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists. 
					 The speakers at the meeting accused Japan of recently behaving shamelessly while justifying the Japanese imperialists' aggression against Korea and colonial rule over it in the past far from apologizing for them.
					
					It is an important duty of the civic and social organizations to eliminate the sycophantic forces serving Japan, they said, declaring that they can never pardon the present "government" which calls for "improving the relations" with Japan whitewashing its past crimes.
					
					 All the people should stage actions to force Japan to make an apology and reparation for its past crimes irrespective of faction and affiliation and all the members of the Korean nation should share the will and get united close, they stressed.
					
					 They called on all the Koreans to actively turn out in the all-people struggle to force Japan to settle its past crimes.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Pro-reunification Forces under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Pro-reunification Forces under Fire
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the United States issued a statement on April 22 denouncing the south Korean puppet authorities for their suppression of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration.
					 The statement condemned the judicial authorities of south Korea for sentencing leading members of the said solidarity to prison terms at a trial held on April 21 after labeling it as an "enemy-benefiting organization." This was an anti-reunification act of totally negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, it pointed out.
					
					 To crack down upon the pro-reunification movement forces on charges of violation of the "National Security Law" is little different from the brutal atrocities the Japanese imperialists perpetrated in the past by executing the advocates of the independence movement on charges of being "criminals", it stressed.
					
					 The statement urged the Lee Myung Bak "government" to immediately lift the label of "enemy-benefiting organization" attached to the solidarity and retract the prison terms imposed upon its leading members.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed at DPRK Diplomatic Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed at DPRK Diplomatic Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Receptions, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place at the DPRK embassies in Vietnam, Syria, Indonesia, Nepal, Malaysia, Mongolia, Cambodia, Italy, Britain, Uzbekistan, Poland, Bulgaria, Switzerland, Uganda, Ethiopia, Nigeria and Peru and the DPRK permanent mission in the UN Secretariat and international organizations in Geneva between Apr. 8 and 15 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					Floral baskets and bouquets were seen before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in the venues of the events.
					
					 On display in the venues of the functions were works of the peerlessly great men, photos showing their immortal Songun leadership exploits and books and photos introducing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 A Vietnamese vice-minister of Foreign Affairs noted with high appreciation that Kim Il Sung had devoted all his life to the struggle for the liberation of the country and socialist construction.
					
					 The Mongolian defence minister said that Kim Il Sung is a person perfectly possessed of humility, kindness and all other personalities as a great man.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Unified Communist Party of Italy said that the Korean people are making signal successes in building a great prosperous and powerful nation while emerging victorious undeterred by any worldwide economic upheavals because Kim Il Sung built the most advantageous socialist state in Korea and laid a strong foundation for its strengthening and development.
					
					 The spokesman (leader) of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) highly praised Kim Il Sung as the great revolutionary and distinguished leader who devoted all his life to the liberation and the independence of the Korean people, prosperity of the country and the popular masses' cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru stressed that the DPRK's recent successful satellite launch demonstrated again the greatness of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the external relations committee of the Democrat Party and the secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Unity Party of Indonesia expressed the belief that the Korean people led by Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, would achieve greater successes in their efforts to build a thriving nation and realize national reunification.
					
					 "Faith of Korea", "The Arch of Triumph" and other Korean films were appreciated at the film shows.

articles.title: DPRK's April Holidays Celebrated
articles.content:
DPRK's April Holidays Celebrated
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Joint seminars of Juche idea study organizations took place in Uganda and Mexico on April 9 and 14 on the occasions of the 97th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 At the seminar held in Uganda, Baguma Isoke, chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who is director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and other speakers said that Kim Il Sung had worked night and day not only in the period of anti-Japanese armed struggle but also even after the country was liberated and the people's living was stabilized.
					
					 They stressed that there was no mistake concerning the lines in the long period during which the President had led the Korean revolution and that there had been the country and the people always in the centre of his thinking and activities.
					
					 At the seminar held in Mexico, Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il as the outstanding thinker and theoretician, great strategist, peerlessly brilliant commander and distinguished veteran statesman who has glorified the revolutionary idea and immortal exploits of the President.
					
					 Saying that the DPRK is now reliably defending the socialist fortress under the original Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, they expressed full support for the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in the efforts to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation by 2012.

articles.title: April Holidays of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
April Holidays of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Sweden, a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Peru, photo exhibitions in Laos and Uganda, a reading session on President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" in Ethiopia and a round-table talk by the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement between Apr. 8 and 28 to commemorate the Day of the Sun, the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 77th founding anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were famous works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos showing their immortal exploits, books and photos introducing the Korean people in the efforts to achieve the national reunification and build a great prosperous and powerful nation and handicrafts representing the wisdom and skills of the Korean nation.
					
					 Meanwhile, Korean film shows took place in Thailand, Laos, Malaysia and the Czech Republic between Apr. 7 and 21 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the 77th birthday of the heroic KPA.
					
					 Appreciated at the shows were such Korean films as "Kimilsungia", "The Ever-victorious, Military Ranks in Parade", "The 75th Founding Anniversary of the Heroic Korean People's Army" and "Order No. 027."

articles.title: April Holidays of DPRK Commemorated in Different Countries
articles.content:
April Holidays of DPRK Commemorated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Juche idea study organizations and friendship organizations in different countries published bulletins from April 10 to 14 to commemorate the Day of the Sun and the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain in its bulletin carried a photograph of President Kim Il Sung and introduced the immortal exploits he performed for the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					 The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna in its bulletin carried a portrait of the President and an article entitled "On the Occasion of the 97th Birth Anniversary of President Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association in its bulletin carried several articles under such titles as "Example of Internationalism", "The Korean People's Army-Main Force for Socialist Cause" and "Korea, Land of Morning Calm".
					
					 The articles highly lauded the President's life and exploits and the unique Songun politics of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Escuela Secundaria de Sojung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Escuela Secundaria de Sojung
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la recien construida Escuela Secundaria de Sojung laureada con el Titulo de la Bandera Roja de Honor del distrito de Rakwon.
					  Esta escuela es el plantel docente-regalo del Dirigente quien envio personalmente a los constructores militares a fin de construirla para los ninos del pueblo costeno y le mando numerosos instrumentos educacionales incluidas computadoras.
					
					  Despues de escuchar el historial de la escuela el Dirigente, guiado por el director, recorrio la sala de practica de computadoras y se entero detalladamente del estado de ensenanza con estos aparatos.
					
					  Senalo que para hacer que todas las personas tengan la alta tecnica de computacion hay que concentrar las fuerzas en la educacion de computacion desde la etapa de educacion primaria y secundaria considerandola como una importante asignatura basica y destaco que para ese efecto es preciso elaborar el proyecto de proceso educativo conforme a las caracteristicas de los alumnos y elevar el nivel de los maestros de este sector. 
					
					  Subrayo que todos los alumnos de la escuela deben aprender con entusiasmo para poseer durante el periodo de estudio la capacidad de usar habilmente la computadora y volvio a resolver todos los problemas que se presentan para el particular.
					
					  Acto seguido,  recorrio el aula, la sala de practica de tractor, la de especimenes de animales disecados, el gimnasio y otros lugares para hacer conocimiento de los detalles de la labor docente de la escuela.
					
					  Preciso que es bueno el que los alumnos de la escuela libran ampliamente diversas practicas de produccion y las actividades de deporte extraescolar como la natacion y anadio que si ellos fomentan la fuerza fisica y aprenden la tecnica de manejo de tractor y camion durante el periodo de la escuela secundaria, podran hacer bien en el futuro el servicio militar y contribuir a la construccion socialista.
					
					  Se mostro muy satisfecho de que en el pasado los maestros y empleados de la escuela hicieron esfuerzos tesoneros por materializar cabalmente la politica del partido de crear a los alumnos como fidedignos trabajadores del pais dispuestos de los ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena salud y lograron muchos exitos en la formacion de generaciones venideras, y evaluo altamente sus proezas.
					
					  La labor de formacion de generaciones venideras es la de gran importancia que decide la prosperidad o la decadencia del pais y la demanda importante para cumplir exitosamente la causa revolucionaria del Juche, subrayo e indico las tareas programaticas que se presentan en la ensenanza de las escuelas secundarias.
					
					  Destaco que el futuro radiante de Corea esta garantizado firmemente gracias a que ya se prepararon la idea y teoria de educacion cientificas y revolucionarias y se establecio el ventajoso sistema de ensenanza.
					
					  El primer deber para los alumnos es estudiar bien, apunto y continuo que las escuelas deben prestar atencion primordial a la labor para materializar cabalmente la orientacion del PTC de dar prioridad al estudio y formar a los integrantes de nueva generacion crecientes como funcionarios competentes capaces de contribuir con alta capacidad a la construccion de la patria prospera. 
					
					  El Dirigente indico que lo mas importante en la labor docente es elevar la calidad de la educacion de la escuela secundaria.
					
					  El Dirigente enseno que segun los esfuerzos de los maestros, se definen el exito de la labor educacional y el estado de capacitacion de las nuevas generaciones, futuro de la patria e indico que conscientes profundamente de su alta responsabilidad y su orgullo de  los revolucionarios profesionales, todos los maestros deben dedicar toda su inteligencia y entusiasmo a la labor educacional de las generaciones venideras.

articles.title: El CS de la ONU debe revocar su "resolucion" y decisiones anti-RPDC
articles.content:
El CS de la ONU debe revocar su "resolucion" y decisiones anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ATCC) -- En relacion con que bajo el pretexto del lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos por parte de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea las perversas maniobras de las fuerzas hostiles entran en la etapa extremadamente peligrosa, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exterior de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 29 una declaracion que senala:
					  Segun la "declaracion presidencial" sin fuerza de restriccion el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU definio oficialmente el dia 24 a tres companias de la RPDC como objetos de sancion y muchas variedades de materiales militares  como articulos de prohibicion de exportacion e importacion a Corea pretextando el lanzamiento del satelite artificial con fines pacificos, ejercicio de nuestra soberania. De esta manera, perpetro los ilegales y atroces actos provocativos de poner en practica la sancion contra la RPDC.
					
					  Estas sanciones no podran aceptarse en absoluto para la RPDC que durante decenas de anos ha venido viviendo bajo toda clase de sanciones y bloqueo de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					  Lo mas grave es que el CS de la ONU, insatisfecho de haber violado flagrantemente la soberania del Estado soberano adhiriendose a las maniobras de EE.UU., tomo ahora el camino de atentar directamente la seguridad del pais y la nacion, supremo interes de la RPDC.
					
					  Al no alcanzar su objeto de desarmarnos mediante las conversaciones a 6 bandas, las fuerzas hostiles  abrigan ahora la ilusion vana de asfixiar de manera fisica nuestra industria de defensa nacional.
					
					  Ya en la decada de 1990 declaramos que si la ONU, parte juridicamente interesada en el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea, aplica la sancion contra la RPDC lo consideraremos como destruccion de ese acuerdo, es decir como la declaracion de guerra.
					
					  Frente a la situacion grave en que debido a las maquinaciones de las fuerzas hostiles se desaparecio eternamente el anhelo de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana junto con las conversaciones a 6 bandas y la situacion llega al borde de la guerra, el MINREX de la RPDC advierte severamente. 
					
					  El CS  de la ONU debe pedir disculpa de inmediato por su atentado a la soberania de la RPDC y revocar  la "resolucion" y las decisiones anti-RPDC aprobadas injusta y discriminadamente.
					
					  Esto deviene la unica salida para que el CS de la ONU pueda cumplir con su responsabilidad de mantener la paz y la seguridad internacionales recuperando la confianza de los paises miembros de la ONU sin ser violado por mas tiempo como instrumento de la coaccion y la arbitrariedad de EE.UU.
					
					  Si el CS de la ONU no pide disculpa de inmediato por el respecto la RPDC actuara como sigue:
					
					  Primero, nos veremos obligados a tomar las adicionales medidas autodefensivas para defender su interes supremo.
					
					  En ellas se incluiran el ensayo nuclear y el de lanzamiento de misiles balisticos intercontinentales.
					
					  Segundo, tomara la decision de la construccion de la central de reactor de agua ligera y, como su primer proceso, iniciara sin demora el desarrollo de tecnicas para producir y asegurar por su propia cuenta los combustibles nucleares.

articles.title: FCGEUS denuncia la represion de banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
FCGEUS denuncia la represion de banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ATCC) -- La Direccion de Lucha del 17o periodo de la "Federacion de Consejos Generales de Estudiantes Universitarios del Sur de Corea" condeno en su declaracion publicada el dia 24 las acciones anti-reunificacion de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					  El dia 21, las autoridades judiciales surcoreanas definieron la Solidaridad de Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Sur-Norte como "entidad pro-enemiga" e impusieron la pena de prision a sus miembros, recuerda la nota y anade que este injusto veredicto significa la negacion total y desafio a la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					 Despues de su fundacion hasta la fecha, la Solidaridad de Ejecucion estuvo siempre al frente de la lucha por la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion, subraya.
					
					 Prosigue que todos los hechos muestran claramente que no se puede esperar nada en el "regimen" de Lee Myung Bak que se volvio loco por la confrontacion con la RPDC y la dictadura fascista.
					
					  El "poder" de Lee es el grupo de vendepatrias serviles a grandes potencias que agrava la tension de la Peninsula Coreana e impide la democratizacion de la sociedad surcoreana y la reunificacion, califica.
					
					  Las autoridades deben revocar la definicion a la SE como "entidad pro-enemiga" y liberar a los encarcelados, demanda el documento.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia abyecto comportamiento de banda de MB
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia abyecto comportamiento de banda de MB
Pyongyang, 29 de abril (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles senala que un cantante surcoreano inserto en un sitio Web de Internet un articulo de elogio al lanzamiento exitoso del satelite artificial de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y prosigue:
					En relacion con ello, el "Gran Partido Nacional" y otras fuerzas conservadoras arman bulla echando blasfemias y reproches de toda indole contra el. Esto es una abominable conducta de quienes arrecian la confrontacion con la RPDC.
					
					  Las fuerzas conservadoras del Sur de Corea disgustadas del exitoso lanzamiento del satelite artificial de la RPDC sueltan tacos contra quien lo elogio merecidamente como un miembro de la nacion coreana, lo cual es viles actos hostiles de quienes tienen la mala intencion y persiguen la confrontacion intercoreana para realizar su malsana ambicion impidiendo a toda costa el exito y el desarrollo de los connacionales.  
					
					  Pero, la banda de Lee Myong Bak se equivoca. Con tales actos desesperados no puede impedir jamas el sentimiento de los surcoreanos inclinado hacia el Norte y su fervorosa aspiracion a la reunificacion independiente en alianza con el Norte.
					
					  Asi, la banda de Lee se aferra tercamente de los actos traidores y de la violencia fascista nadando contra la corriente de la tendencia general, pero adelantara solo su aislamiento y el fracaso politico de si misma.
